Pre-Game Insights: The Ghana Football Association (GFA) has announced that there will be free gate for Ghanaians who wish to watch the friendly match between the Black Stars and Namibia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled for 8pm kick off at the Baba Yara Sports stadium. The public is hereby informed that Centre Line and Popular stand is free of charge.
Others: The friendly match is part of preparations for the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) tournament in Ivory Coast.
The match is a sendoff for the Black Stars to Ivory Coast for the 2023 AFCON.
